summary.profile: Software Engineer with a proven track record of architecting scalable full-stack systems and high-performance Agentic RAG workflows. Specialized in engineering intelligent infrastructure, such as B2B lead platforms and secure natural language database interfaces, using FastAPI, React, and Gemini Vertex AI. Focused on transforming complex data bottlenecks into production-ready, AI-driven products that deliver measurable cost savings and sub-second performance.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected 'Imagini,' a high-performance B2B leads platform housing millions of records, featuring streaming upload pipelines and a credit-based access system. Engineered a multi-agent RAG framework using LangGraph and Gemini to navigate 1.5M Arabic documents with hierarchical workflows. Developed a secure natural language database interface for SWCC and an RFM-based customer segmentation engine for premium airport services.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Fine-tuned DONUT transformer models for OCR-free extraction of French bill data, optimizing for mobile via ONNX conversion. Integrated transformer-based ML models into Next.js applications and built robust data processing pipelines using Python, Pandas, and NumPy, improving use-case accuracy by 25%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Implemented real-time object detection solutions using YOLO. Designed intuitive user interfaces using Figma and contributed to mobile application development using Kotlin.

certifications.name: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning and Data Science
Calculus for Machine Learning and Data Science

projects.name: Mandumah Multi-Doc Agent
projects.description: An agentic RAG system designed to navigate 1.5M Arabic academic documents using a hierarchical meta-agent architecture and graph-based traversal. Optimized for complex linguistic nuances with automated summarization tools.

details.description: This project involved developing an advanced agentic RAG system for a major Saudi Arabian academic platform to navigate a corpus of 1.5 million documents. It focuses on extracting insights from unstructured Arabic textual data using a hierarchical meta-agent architecture.
points: Architecture: Implemented a hierarchical meta-agent using graph-based traversal to orchestrate document-level agents.
Technical Innovation: Engineered tool-calling mechanisms for real-time Arabic summarization and query answering.
Scaling: Optimized performance for large-scale Arabic text, handling morphological complexity and right-to-left scripting.

projects.name: High-Scale Email Verification System
projects.description: Multi-layered validation pipeline utilizing DNS resolution, SMTP probing, and heuristics to reduce verification costs by 90%. Supports concurrent processing of hundreds of thousands of emails.

details.description: Designed as a cost-effective alternative to commercial services, this system processes hundreds of thousands of email addresses with extreme concurrency. It utilizes a multi-layered validation pipeline to ensure high deliverability for large-scale cold outreach campaigns.
points: Cost Efficiency: Built a high-concurrency pipeline that reduced verification costs by 90% compared to commercial services.
Verification Pipeline: Developed multi-layered checks including DNS resolution, SMTP probing, and deliverability heuristics.
Scale: Leveraged asynchronous workers and distributed task queues to process hundreds of thousands of emails concurrently.
Feature Addition: Created an email-guessing module to generate and validate probable corporate email permutations.

projects.name: ThunderJaw Restaurant POS
projects.description: Developed a high-performance desktop POS system using Electron and React 19, streamlining restaurant operations through real-time order tracking and kitchen management. I engineered a robust architecture featuring Role-Based Access Control, automated PostgreSQL migrations with Knex.js, and multi-language support.

details.description: ThunderJaw is a high-performance, cross-platform desktop application designed to streamline complex restaurant operations, including real-time order tracking and kitchen management. The system integrates inventory control and financial reporting into a unified interface, bridging the gap between core system logic and the user experience via real-time IPC.
points: System Architecture: Developed a cross-platform desktop application using Electron and React 19, utilizing TypeScript for robust type safety.
Database Management: Leveraged Knex.js with PostgreSQL to handle advanced relational data, automated migrations, and seeding.
Security & Access: Implemented a secure authentication system featuring role-based access control (RBAC) to manage worker permissions and logistics.
Technical Features: Integrated multi-language support (i18next), real-time IPC handlers, and Excel exporting for comprehensive business reporting.

projects.name: B2B Leads Platform (Imagini)
projects.description: Architected a scalable platform managing millions of leads, featuring streaming data ingestion and a credit-based access system for B2B users. Optimized database indexing and caching to maintain sub-second search and filtering performance across massive datasets.

details.description: This comprehensive B2B data platform manages millions of professional leads. It features a robust credit-based access system and a high-performance streaming ingestion pipeline.
points: Data Management: Architected a scalable platform hosting millions of professional leads with a focus on the KSA market.
Performance: Engineered streaming data ingestion and optimized indexing to maintain sub-second search responses.
Security & Monetization: Designed a secure credit-based access system with granular admin controls and audit trails.
Full-Stack Development: Built a responsive React dashboard integrated with a high-performance FastAPI backend.
